column3: str

Where does the future of fashion lie? Inquiring Loporrits─Managingway among them─wish to know.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the restless Loporrit in the Carrotorium.
Deliver the requested item to Managingway.
Speak with the restless Loporrit in the Carrotorium.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),9))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),10))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),11))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),8))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),12))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),13))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),14))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),15))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Managingway</If><Else/></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If>.
This may come as a shock to you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, but it seems our Ways have developed an insatiable interest in clothing!
Is this not a remarkable achievement of individuality? Why, we have always worn identical garb for as long as I can remember.

Yet as we speak, one of our Ways is busy gathering a range of materials with which to make <Emphasis>fashion</Emphasis>. I was hoping you might assist them─they asked for you by name, after all. You'll find them in the Carrotorium.
O-Oh! How wonderful to see you again. D-Do you remember me? I was the one who made you and your friends outfits when you first arrived! Um...I-I've practiced quite a lot since then!
I'm still in the process of gathering supplies, but I thought that maybe...you could craft something for us?
Thank you for your help the other day! Everyone really liked what you made, so maybe...you could craft something for us again?
I was thinking something shiny and impressive, like a buckle. Buckles are “in,” right? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.
I was thinking a “chic” accessory might be nice. Did I use that word right? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.
I was thinking something glittery that will make the fabric sparkle. Is that hard to do? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.
When you're done, I'd like you to go and show Managingway what you made. I'll be thinking up “trendy” new designs, if you need anything.
Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.
Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.
Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.
Oh, you've run out of material! It is sort of tricky to twist the thing, isn't it? A-Anyway, here you are.
Oh, you've run out of material! Um, I don't really know what “chic” means, so I'll leave it to you, okay? A-Anyway, here you are.
Oh, you've run out of material! No such thing as too glittery, right? A-Anyway, here you are.
How goes the fashion creation?
My, how daring! I do believe I would enjoy wearing something like this myself.
I wonder what sort of outfit this will help create. The possibilities seem endless when one stops to consider them.
That Way is both hardworking and determined, so I have no doubt their journey upon the road of fashion will be long and fruitful. I do hope you will lend them your expertise again!
Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
